<p>There's lots of good information out there about Content-Security-Policy, but here's some useful resources:</p>

<p>
    <a href="https://github.com/Offroadcode/umbraco-content-security-policy">Easy Content-Security-Policy Package Documentation</a><br/>
    <a href="https://scotthelme.co.uk/content-security-policy-an-introduction/">Introduction to Content-Security-Policy</a><br/>
    <a href="https://cultiv.nl/blog/so-you-want-to-secure-your-umbraco-site/">Securing Your Umbraco Site</a><br/>
    <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP">MDN Content-Security-Policy Web Docs</a>
</p>
